page.title: 09Games ancient and modern.
page.content: The games we play today are much different to the ones that children 50 years ago used to play.One of the older games is Jack across the water.One person was Jack and everyone else had to say a special verse and then run past Jack.If anyone was caught they were Jack.Another game was Roman Soldiers when 2 teams lined up opposite each other and sang 5 verses and then they started hitting each other playfully as they crossed over. Nowadays games are not much different,but have changed just a little,such as Bulldog which is nearly the same as Jack across the water. Some games are new though,such as Netball.This has 2 teams of 7.All have places to play.The aim is to get more goals than the other team.
